metadata.description: Rani cut off her wings to save Pixie Hollow and her fairy friends, but a fairy who can't fly is unheard of. After a disastrous accident at the Fairy Dance, she runs away to try and find her own place to belong. Maybe the mermaid lagoon could be her new home... Join Rani and the rest of the Disney fairies — and mermaids! — on this magical adventure. Add another Disney Fairies manga to your Disney Manga Collection!
metadata.name: Disney Manga: Fairies
